Use it to develop PR strategies, craft compelling brand stories, leverage proprietary data for newsworthy content, and build relationships with media and influencers. Triggers: PR, public relations, media outreach, brand story, press release.

name: reputation-management
description: This skill helps manage and improve a business's online reputation. Use it to handle online reviews, monitor brand mentions, and implement strategies to build a positive brand image. Trigger keywords: reputation management, online reviews, brand monitoring.

name: researching-competitor-ads
description: This skill analyzes competitor ad strategies, deconstructing their campaigns to provide strategic insights. Use it when you need to understand what's working in your market, improve your ad copy, and discover new creative angles.

name: retail-media-networks
description: This skill enables Claude to act as a specialist in Retail Media Networks. Use when a user asks for help with advertising on platforms like Amazon Advertising, Walmart Connect, or other retailer websites. It helps with strategy, execution, and optimization of retail media campaigns.

name: retargeting-campaign-strategy
description: This skill creates a comprehensive retargeting campaign strategy based on the teachings of Jon Penberthy and Frank Kern. It covers audience segmentation, sequential ad creative, frequency capping, platform tactics, exclusion audiences, and creative fatigue prevention.

name: sales-funnels
description: This skill transforms Claude into a world-class sales funnel architect following Russell Brunson's ClickFunnels methodology and Todd Brown's E5 CAMP framework. Use it for building high-converting funnels including lead gen, tripwire, webinar, VSL, high-ticket application, and backend continuity funnels. Covers the Value Ladder, Perfect Webinar, Hook-Story-Offer, The Stack, and Epiphany Bridge frameworks.

name: scaling-demand-systems
description: Builds a comprehensive, multi-channel demand generation strategy to attract and convert a business's ideal customers. Use this skill when you need to develop a holistic marketing plan, from top-of-funnel awareness to bottom-of-funnel conversion.

name: search-engine-marketing-sem
description: This skill enables Claude to act as a Search Engine Marketing (SEM) specialist. Use it to create, manage, and optimize paid search campaigns on platforms like Google Ads and Bing Ads. It is ideal for tasks involving keyword research, ad copywriting, landing page optimization, and campaign analysis.

name: search-engine-optimization-seo
description: This skill transforms Claude into a Search Engine Optimization (SEO) specialist. Use it to develop and implement SEO strategies, including keyword research, content optimization, technical SEO, and link building, to improve website rankings and drive organic traffic. Trigger this skill for tasks related to SEO audits, content creation, and improving search visibility.

name: sms-mobile-marketing
description: The SMS & Mobile Marketing skill helps users create and manage effective SMS marketing campaigns. Use this skill to get guidance on compliance, audience segmentation, content personalization, and campaign optimization. Trigger this skill for questions about SMS marketing, mobile marketing, text message campaigns, and subscriber engagement.

name: social-media-advertising
description: This skill transforms Claude into a social media advertising specialist. Use it to create, manage, and optimize social media ad campaigns, develop content strategies, and analyze performance to achieve specific business goals like brand awareness, lead generation, or sales. Trigger this skill for tasks involving Facebook Ads, Instagram advertising, content calendars, and social media ROI.

name: social-media-organic
description: This skill transforms Claude into a specialist in organic social media marketing. Use it to develop strategies, create high-quality content, and build an engaged community. Trigger with keywords like 'social media strategy', 'organic marketing', or 'community building'.

name: sponsorships-partnerships
description: This skill enables Claude to act as a world-class sponsorships and partnerships specialist. It should be used when a user needs to create, manage, or optimize a partnership strategy. Trigger keywords include sponsorship, partnership, collaboration, co-branding, and influencer marketing.

name: story-driven-email-campaigns
description: This skill creates story-driven email campaigns using Andre Chaperon's Soap Opera Sequence. Use it to write compelling email sequences that build relationships and drive sales through narrative.

name: tripwire-funnel-optimization
description: This skill optimizes tripwire funnels using Todd Brown's E5 methodology to create irresistible offers, optimize pricing, and design high-converting upsell paths for maximum customer acquisition and profitability.

name: upsell-downsell-scripting
description: "This skill enables the agent to create high-converting upsell and downsell scripts based on Russell Brunson's One-Time Offer (OTO) methodology. Use it to optimize order bumps, structure upsell pages, and implement effective downsell strategies without applying excessive pressure. Triggers: upsell script, downsell strategy, OTO, order bump, thank-you page optimization."

name: vsl-script-writing

name: webinar-script-writing
description: This skill enables the agent to create high-converting webinar scripts using the frameworks of Jason Fladlien and Jon Penberthy. It covers the entire process from introduction and content structure to offer presentation, objection handling, and closing sequences. Use this skill for webinar script creation, webinar strategy, and improving webinar performance.

name: webinars-virtual-events
description: This skill transforms Claude into a webinar marketing specialist following Jason Fladlien's One to Many selling methodology and Russell Brunson's Perfect Webinar framework.
